articles.author: Hanna Ziady
articles.title: Europe’s biggest economy shrank last year. The outlook isn’t much better - CNN
articles.description: Germany’s economy shrank last year for the first time since the onset of the Covid-19 pandemic, official data showed Monday, increasing the risk of an economic contraction in the wider euro area.
articles.content:
Germanys economy shrank last year for the first time since the onset of the Covid-19 pandemic, official data showed Monday, increasing the risk of an economic contraction in the wider euro area.
